00006 SEXP xTMatrix_validate(SEXP x)
00007 {
00008     /* Almost everything now in Tsparse_validate ( ./Tsparse.c )
00009      * *but* the checking of the 'x' slot : */
00010     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym)) !=
00011         LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)))
00012         return mkString(_("lengths of slots i and x must match"));
00013     return ScalarLogical(1);
00014 }
00015 
00016 static void
00017 d_insert_triplets_in_array(int m, int n, int nnz,
00018                            const int xi[], const int xj[],
00019                            const double xx[], double vx[])
00020 {
00021     int i;
00022     memset(vx, 0, sizeof(double) * m * n);
00023     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) {
00024         vx[xi[i] + xj[i] * m] += xx[i]; /* allow redundant entries in x */
00025     }
00026 }
00027 
00028 static void
00029 l_insert_triplets_in_array(int m, int n, int nnz,
00030                            const int xi[], const int xj[],
00031                            const int xx[], int vx[])
00032 {
00033     int i;
00034     memset(vx, 0, sizeof(int) * m * n);
00035     for (i = 0; i < nnz; i++) {
00036         vx[xi[i] + xj[i] * m] += xx[i]; /* allow redundant entries in x */
00037     }
00038 }

00040 #define MAKE_gTMatrix_to_geMatrix(_t1_, _SEXPTYPE_, _SEXP_)             \
00041 SEXP _t1_ ## gTMatrix_to_ ## _t1_ ## geMatrix(SEXP x)                   \
00042 {                                                                       \
00043     SEXP dd = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym),                               \
00044         islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym),                               \
00045         ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(#_t1_ "geMatrix")));        \
00046                                                                         \
00047     int *dims = INTEGER(dd),                                            \
00048         m = dims[0],                                                    \
00049         n = dims[1];                                                    \
00050                                                                         \
00051     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_factorSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 0));            \
00052     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(dd));                        \
00053     SET_DimNames(ans, x);                                               \
00054     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, allocVector(_SEXPTYPE_, m * n));         \
00055     _t1_ ## _insert_triplets_in_array(m, n, length(islot),              \
00056                                       INTEGER(islot),                   \
00057                                       INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)),\
00058                                       _SEXP_(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), \
00059                                       _SEXP_(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym))); \
00060     UNPROTECT(1);                                                       \
00061     return ans;                                                         \
00062 }

00064 MAKE_gTMatrix_to_geMatrix(d, REALSXP, REAL)
00065 
00066 MAKE_gTMatrix_to_geMatrix(l, LGLSXP, LOGICAL)
00067 
00068 #undef MAKE_gTMatrix_to_geMatrix

00070 #define MAKE_gTMatrix_to_matrix(_t1_, _SEXPTYPE_, _SEXP_)               \
00071 SEXP _t1_ ## gTMatrix_to_matrix(SEXP x)                                 \
00072 {                                                                       \
00073     SEXP dd = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym),                               \
00074         dn = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym),                           \
00075         islot = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_iSym);                               \
00076     int m = INTEGER(dd)[0],                                             \
00077         n = INTEGER(dd)[1];                                             \
00078     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(_SEXPTYPE_, m, n));                  \
00079     if(VECTOR_ELT(dn, 0) != R_NilValue || VECTOR_ELT(dn, 1) != R_NilValue) \
00080         /* matrix() with non-trivial dimnames */                        \
00081         setAttrib(ans, R_DimNamesSymbol, duplicate(dn));                \
00082     _t1_ ## _insert_triplets_in_array(m, n, length(islot),              \
00083                                       INTEGER(islot),                   \
00084                                       INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_jSym)),\
00085                                       _SEXP_(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), \
00086                                       _SEXP_(ans));                     \
00087     UNPROTECT(1);                                                       \
00088     return ans;                                                         \
00089 }

00092 
00093 MAKE_gTMatrix_to_matrix(l, LGLSXP, LOGICAL)

00095 #undef MAKE_gTMatrix_to_matrix

00098 #ifdef _valid_only_for_old_graph_package
00099 SEXP graphNEL_as_dgTMatrix(SEXP x, SEXP symmetric)
00100 {
00101     int sym = asLogical(symmetric);
00102     SEXP nodes = GET_SLOT(x, install("nodes")),
00103         edgeL = GET_SLOT(x, install("edgeL")),
00104         ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(sym
00105                                             ? "dsTMatrix"
00106                                             : "dgTMatrix")));
00107     int *ii, *jj, *dims, i, j, nnd = LENGTH(nodes), pos, totl;
00108     double *xx;
00109 
00110     totl = 0;
00111     for (i = 0; i < nnd; i++)
00112         totl += LENGTH(Matrix_getElement(VECTOR_ELT(edgeL, i), "edges"));
00113     dims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00114     dims[0] = dims[1] = nnd;
00115     if (isString(nodes)) {
00116         SEXP dnms = ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, VECSXP, 2);
00117         SET_VECTOR_ELT(dnms, 0, duplicate(nodes));
00118         SET_VECTOR_ELT(dnms, 1, duplicate(nodes));
00119     }
00120     ii = Alloca(totl, int);
00121     jj = Alloca(totl, int);
00122     xx = Alloca(totl, double);
00123     R_CheckStack();
00124     pos = 0;
00125     for (i = 0; i < nnd; i++) {
00126         SEXP edg = VECTOR_ELT(edgeL, i);
00127         SEXP edges = Matrix_getElement(edg, "edges"),
00128             weights = Matrix_getElement(edg, "weights");
00129         int *edgs = INTEGER(PROTECT(coerceVector(edges, INTSXP))),
00130             nedg = LENGTH(edges);
00131         double *wts = REAL(weights);
00132 
00133         for (j = 0; j < nedg; j++) {
00134             int j1 = edgs[j] - 1;
00135                         /* symmetric case stores upper triangle only */
00136             if ((!sym) || i <= j1) {
00137                 ii[pos] = i;
00138                 jj[pos] = j1;
00139                 xx[pos] = wts[j];
00140                 pos++;
00141             }
00142         }
00143         UNPROTECT(1);
00144     }
00145     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_iSym, INTSXP, pos)), ii, pos);
00146     Memcpy(INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_jSym, INTSXP, pos)), jj, pos);
00147     Memcpy(REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, pos)), xx, pos);
00148 
00149     UNPROTECT(1);
00150     return ans;
00151 }
00152 #endif
